criteria: >80% unit test coverage for all new Cloud Functions; All Firestore Security Rule tests passing; No critical SonarQube issues.
All E2E tests for online and offline check-in/out scenarios passing on both iOS and Android; No P1 or P2 bugs reported from manual QA.
bypass_criteria: Critical bugs have an approved mitigation plan and are ticketed for the next sprint.
success_metrics: Core attendance workflow is stable and reliable for release.
